channel.title: Random Question
channel.description: I have this code for dds, on walking, attacking, and such. [code] //Weapon-Stand-Walk-Run-FightTy-Op1-Op2-Op3-Op4-Block id = 5698 -1 1146 1210 0 252 -1 -1 -1 415 //Dragon dagger(s)[/code] It's in my weaponHandler.cfg. How would I make it behave like a normal dds, but attack like spec with no spec bar?

item.title: Random Question
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
